page.title: 02Schools <Primary>
page.content:
Well Street School, The School was{built in{1879}and was once a Board School. There are 7 teachers and one welfare assistant in a school of 200 children. The age range is {5 to 9.}It has a variety of activities at playtimes including skipping and football. There are paintings on the walls to cheer up the surroundings because of the lack of playing fields in the area.
Chandos Middle School, This School is situated in the centre of Buckingham. It was {built in 1906 }for the Royal Latin School.The school has 220 pupils and 8 teachers. The school day is from 9am until 3.40pm. Its age range is{10 {to 12}yrs.Chandos moved to this school in 1963. In 1974 there was a {new {section built}on to the old school.
